author: Surabhi Agarwal
title: Firms look for ways to keep home-based staff engaged
description: Firms look for ways to keep home-based staff engagedFrom virtual parties to food delivery, firms are going all out to fill the void left by water cooler conversations and cafeteria lunches.
content:
New Delhi: Pritam Thakur who lives by his own in Bengaluru used to take pride in the fact that his firm, homegrown regional-language social media platform ShareChat, celebrated every festival with a lot of fanfare in its offices.
